channel.title: Deltascape client interface
channel.description: My deltascapeclient has a spritefile (duh) wich contains my interfaces. But My sprites , and so my interfaces, are .jag files... I want to change the interface, but I now don't know how to change it...

item.title: Deltascape client interface
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

thank you so much, it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape client interface
item.dc:creator: @xLightning xLightning
item.description:
@xLightning wrote:

Open Notepad and paste this in:

ren *.jag *.png

Save it as a .bat file such as jag2png.bat in your sprites folder or wherever the .jag files are located. Run the script and it will rename all of the files to .png which you should be able to work with. When you are done either edit your old .bat file or make a new one with this in it:

ren *.png *.jag

and save as png2jag.bat and run that when you are done editing the interfaces/sprites and it will convert the files back to .jag so the client can use them.

Hope I helped!

Read full topic
